title: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971 - When trying to copy a package in project Ae, the 'copy package' option does not behave as expected. Instead, it is showing a strange behavior. The issue seems to be related to the package destination. Instead of showing 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' as the destination, it is displaying a different value. This issue can be reproduced by following the steps below:
OB: When attempting to copy a package in project Ae, the 'copy package' option does not show the expected destination value.
EB: The 'copy package' option should display 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' as the destination when trying to copy a package in project Ae.
SR:
1. Create a new project (e.g., xxx).
2. Open the package viewer.
3. Select a package in project Ae.
4. From the context menu, choose the 'copy' option.
